duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and design cloud-based solutions on the AWS platform using Node JS, Java, and other relevant technologies.
Provide technical leadership and guidance to other development teams.
Analyze system architecture, identify areas of improvement, and develop solutions.
Develop test cases and automation frameworks to ensure product quality.
Monitor system performance and availability, and troubleshoot technical issues.
Stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices in the cloud computing space.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
